course-overview.description: This section provides an overview of the course content and structure.

hardware-requirements.title: Hardware Requirements
hardware-requirements.description: This section lists the recommended hardware for the course.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.description: Imagine you created a super-smart AI — it can reason, understand language, make plans, and even predict outcomes. On a computer screen, it’s powerful. But it’s stuck. It cannot walk across a room to pick up a cup. It cannot push a button or open a door. Its intelligence is trapped inside a digital box.

lab-architecture.title: Lab Architecture
lab-architecture.description: This section describes the architecture of the lab environment.

learning-outcomes.title: Learning Outcomes
learning-outcomes.description: Upon completion of this course, students will be able to:

module-1-ros2.title: Module 1: ROS2
module-1-ros2.description: This module covers the fundamentals of ROS2.

module-2-gazebo-unity.title: Module 2: Gazebo & Unity
module-2-gazebo-unity.description: This module compares and contrasts Gazebo and Unity for robotics simulation.

module-3-isaac.title: Module 3: Isaac
module-3-isaac.description: This module delves into NVIDIA Isaac for robotics development.

module-4-vla.title: Module 4: VLA
module-4-vla.description: This module explores Visual-Language-Action (VLA) models in robotics.

physical-ai-importance.title: The Importance of Physical AI
physical-ai-importance.description: This section discusses the significance of Physical AI.

preface.title: Preface
preface.description: Till today, I have co-authored multiple books and crafted numerous pieces of poetry. However, this is my first book on Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics, born from countless hours of co-learning with diverse AI agents, through explorations and experimentations, constantly pushing my boundaries.

student-kit.title: Student Kit
student-kit.description: This section details the contents of the student kit.

weekly-breakdown.title: Weekly Breakdown
weekly-breakdown.description: This section outlines the course content on a weekly basis.
